Title: Building Blox
Description: Building Blox is an Open Source ASP.NET AJAX (C#) Drag and Drop Website Portal Developed by Yousef Wadi. This is a portal system that allows the administrators to drag and drop their content on their portal, as well as use ready made controls or custom made controls.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Building Blox is an Open Source ASP.NET AJAX (C#) Drag and Drop Website Portal Developed by Yousef Wadi. This is a portal system that allows the administrators to drag and drop their content on their portal, as well as use ready made controls or custom made controls.
To cntact me visit http://www.ywadi.com
